users.label: Users
users.subtitle: Manage all registered users and their account settings.

user-table.subtitle: View, search, and manage user accounts across the platform
user-table.caption: Showing {showing} of {count} users | Showing {showing} of {count} user | Showing {showing} of {count} users

single.error: Unable to retrieve information for user ID { id }. Please try again.

account-details.title: Account Details
account-details.subtitle: Update profile data, login details, and system permissions
account-details.success: Changes to the user account were saved successfully.

delete-account.title: Account Status
delete-account.subtitle: Permanently remove this user and all associated data from the system

delete-account.success: The user account has been permanently removed.

avatar.title: Profile Picture
avatar.subtitle: Upload a new image or delete the existing profile photo

remove-avatar.title: Remove Profile Picture
remove-avatar.body: This will permanently remove the user's current profile image. Are you sure you want to continue?
remove-avatar.success: The user's profile image has been removed successfully.

games.title: Create and modify your games & software
games.subtitle: Video Games!

create.title: New Game or Software

placeholders.name: Super Mario Bros.
placeholders.description: A side scrolling 2D platformer and first entry in the Super Mario franchise, Super Mario Bros. follows Italian plumber Mario as he treks across many levels of platforming challenges featuring hostile enemies to rescue Princess Peach from the evil king Bowser.

create.success: New game object has been created successfully.
